text.section: A political subdivision may issue bonds for the purpose of financing loans made through the Program.
To issue a bond, a political subdivision shall adopt an ordinance or a resolution that specifies the maximum principal amount of the bond.

As the political subdivision considers appropriate to effect the Program, the ordinance or resolution may:
Specify the items listed in subsection (d) of this section;
Authorize the finance board of the political subdivision to specify those items by resolution or ordinance; or
Authorize the chief executive of the political subdivision to specify those items by executive order.
